tasks.description: List of actionable items derived from the audio.

tags.description: List of single-word, singular tags for organization (e.g., 'redFort', 'rohit', 'goa').

input_to_sentences.description: A complete, natural-English breakdown of the input into clean, standalone sentences, each tagged with an importance score.

sentence.description: A polished, standalone sentence preserving original meaning and tone.

importance_score.description: A real-valued importance score indicating how critical this sentence is for contextual retrieval.
